title: How to start my career as a freelance writer - Quora

response.answer_text: First, you need to figure out your interests. What do/can you write about? Writing as a passion and profession is different. Learn more about freelance content writing – what do they write, how much time they devote and other basic things. Start with some of the online websites like Truelancer, Freelancer, Upwork, etc. You can also browse Naukri or Indeed for the same – they also have huge opportunities. Also, the compensation varies for the work – sometimes you might get a lot of work, at times you may not. Thus learn more about this field – being a freelancer have its own pros and cons. For further help, guidance or work, feel free to contact me. God bless you!

Register yourself as a freelance writer the online freelance portals and try to get some assignments. You can also check at the local search sites like olx, quikr to see if any freelance writing projects available at your region. Spread the word to your friends and other people in your close circle that you are interested to take up writing assignments. Once if you complete the first few writing projects successfully, you will see more of that sort naturally coming up your way.
